content: Outside of your transformation, try to use Spirits who can attack multiple targets like the Earth Wolf’s charge, and consider using the Pillar Stance’s heavy attack to spin around on staff and attack the group as a whole.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Cellar'.
The content is as follows:
Outside of your transformation, try to use Spirits who can attack multiple targets like the Earth Wolf’s charge, and consider using the Pillar Stance’s heavy attack to spin around on staff and attack the group as a whole.
